question.text:
In the following reaction sequence in aqueous solution, the species X, Y and Z respectively, are

S 2 O 3 2− → Ag + X    Clear  Solution → Ag + Y     White Precipitate → With time Z      Black Precipitate

options.text: <math><msup><mrow><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi></math>

<math><msup><mrow><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi></math>

<math><msup><mrow><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math>

<math><msup><mrow><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">gS</mi></math>

solution.text: So, X,Y and Z are AgS2O323-, Ag2S2O3 and Ag2S respectively.
